subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko, who has been the subject of a match-fixing inquiry, was not chosen by the Russian captain Shamil Tarpishchev to play singles in the Davis Cup finals.
snippet: Nikolay Davydenko, who has been the subject of a match-fixing inquiry, was not chosen by the Russian captain Shamil Tarpishchev to play singles in the Davis Cup finals.
